products.name: Performance Laptop
products.description: A high-end laptop for professionals and gamers, featuring the latest CPU and GPU for unparalleled performance.

products.name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
products.description: Immerse yourself in music with these headphones featuring adaptive noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

products.name: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
products.description: Experience vibrant colors and deep blacks with this 55-inch 4K Smart TV, with all your favorite streaming apps built-in.

products.name: Professional DSLR Camera
products.description: Capture stunning photos and videos with this professional-grade DSLR camera, featuring a 24MP sensor and interchangeable lenses.

products.name: Smartwatch with Fitness Tracker
products.description: Stay connected and track your fitness goals with this stylish smartwatch. Monitors heart rate, steps, and sleep.

products.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: Improve your posture and comfort during long work hours with this fully adjustable ergonomic office chair.

products.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Take your music anywhere with this waterproof and dustproof portable speaker. 12 hours of playtime on a single charge.

products.name: Electric Coffee Grinder
products.description: Get the perfect grind for your coffee beans every time. Features multiple grind settings for different brewing methods.

products.name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: Keep your floors clean with minimal effort. This smart robot vacuum maps your home and can be controlled via an app.

products.name: Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: A durable and responsive mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting, perfect for typing and gaming.

products.name: Gaming Monitor
products.description: A 27-inch gaming monitor with a 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time for smooth and immersive gameplay.

products.name: Smart Home Hub
products.description: Control all your smart home devices from one central hub. Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple HomeKit.

products.name: Wireless Charging Pad
products.description: Conveniently charge your Qi-compatible devices with this sleek wireless charging pad. Fast charging supported.

products.name: Action Camera
products.description: Capture your adventures in stunning 4K resolution with this compact and durable action camera, featuring image stabilization.

products.name: Smart Thermostat
products.description: Save energy and stay comfortable with this smart thermostat that learns your schedule and can be controlled remotely via an app.
